# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  comparator.cir tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} comparator.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bsim3;capacitor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP comparator.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} comparator.cir ${OutputDataDir}/COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.prn comparator.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED comparator.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bsim3;capacitor")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY} comparator.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bsim3;capacitor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP comparator.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} comparator.cir ${OutputDataDir}/COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.prn comparator.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED comparator.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}COMPARATOR/comparator.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bsim3;capacitor")
endif()
